lead_paragraph: First lady Michelle Obama wrapped up her speech to dozens of U.S. athletes to mark 100 days before the Rio Games and immediately headed over to a temporary court set up in the middle of Times Square.

headline.print_headline: US Olympic Fencer Ibtihaj Muhammad Comfortable Speaking Out
headline.main: US Olympic Fencer Ibtihaj Muhammad Comfortable Speaking Out
